content: That's great advice! I'll definitely send a thank-you note or email to Emily after the audition to express my gratitude and reiterate my interest in the role. I'll make sure to keep it brief, professional, and sincere, and reference something specific about the audition to show that I was engaged and paying attention. I'll also ask about the next steps in the audition process to show that I'm eager to move forward. Thanks for the example email and additional tips!
